article:
This is a 'list of [[decade]]s' from the beginning of the 17th century BC to the
end of the 22nd Century AD, including links to corresponding articles with more
information about them.

During the 20th century, it became common to consider individual decades as
historical entities in themselves . Particular trends, styles, and
attitudes would be associated with and regarded as defining particular decades
(which became known as "The Twenties", "The Sixties" and so on).  {|
class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;"
